author: p0W3RH311
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

hi guys !!

as a user i want to facilitate the interaction between excel and the other product office with powershell. VBA is there but its verbose. i want if its possible to support the LANGUAGE powershell with office like VBA ?  the benefits its to have a language powerfull, elegant and easiest.

### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

for example: if we like write VBA code with excel developpement tool the editor support powershell as native language like VBA

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as external and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been be closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: powershell instead of VBA
